data.message: Fix code_review_verifier false positive for method calls: Distinguished ast.Name calls (built-ins like eval) from ast.Attribute calls (methods like obj.compile). Added DANGEROUS_ATTR_CALLS set for explicit module.function patterns. Verified fix catches real threats while ignoring safe method calls.
data.task: Fix code_review_verifier false positive for method calls
data.outcome: Distinguished ast.Name calls (built-ins like eval) from ast.Attribute calls (methods like obj.compile). Added DANGEROUS_ATTR_CALLS set for explicit module.function patterns. Verified fix catches real threats while ignoring safe method calls.
